After the victim is trapped in Haku's ice mirrors, he attacks the victim at high speed like he does with the [[Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals]] technique. During this, the dome starts to float in the air. After that, a clash of blue light explodes inside the dome, damaging the victim greatly. Right before this happens, Haku escapes at the last second, to prevent harm to himself. The mirrors then shatter into a million ice pieces.
